archimate:Principle.name: Inclusive by Design
archimate:Principle.documentation: A widely recognized design practice for building inclusion into systems, products, services, and buildings from the very start. Specific Inclusive by Design principles for Sovrin Infrastructure are a subset of the Core Principles of the Sovrin Governance Framework.
